Carnage/Teltoli

* Carnage sighed as she and Teltoli entered the forest and into it's cool 
shade. Her shoulder still hurt from the fall but she was a trooper and could 
handle it.
Teltoli walked beside Carnage as they walked in further into the forest, she 
would no longer be able to see the raptor if she flew so she decided to join 
her on the ground.
Teltoli laughed...*

Teltoli: " What would happen to Megatron if you put a fake pig's snout on 
his face?"

* Carnage thought for a moment as the trees cut out most of the dwindling 
light then smiled...*

Carnage: " He'd probably start to have a craving for corn."
*She snickered but knew that the joke wasn't really funny, the result of 
split second thinking she guessed.
Teltoli looked up at Carnage and shook her head, she didn't even catch the 
joke.She continued to walk deeper into the forest with Carnage until all of 
the light from the sky faded into the black of night that she always knew.
Carnage sighed and sniffed the air, a faint sent caught her attention and 
soon she put her nose to the ground. She began to follow it, Teltoli 
trailing a short distance behind.She couldn't put her claw on the sent but 
it seemed familiar.
She followed the sent until her snout suddenly ran into a leaf pile and hit 
something hard.*

Carnage: "Ow!"

* Teltoli came up beside Carnage and looked at the pile of leaves then 
turned to the reptile.*

Teltoli: "What is it?"

* Carnage pulled her snout back but then sniffed around the leaves again, 
she knew that sent! She suddenly reared her head back and pushed Teltoli 
away from the pile with her hurt shoulder.*

" Get out of here!"

* Teltoli stepped back in surprise and looked up at Carnage*

Teltoli: "Why?"

* Carnage bared her teeth and backed into Teltoli, keeping herself between 
the pile and the Fuzor.
While trying to find food she had accidentally run into the sleeping spot of 
the clone instead!
She was wondering why the sent smelled familiar!*
